OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients receive peptide vaccine comprise MART-1:27-35 peptide , gp100:209-217 ( 210M ) peptide , tyrosinase peptide sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) CpG 7909 emulsify incomplete Freund 's adjuvant subcutaneously day 1 15 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 13 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Blood sample collect baseline , day 50-53 , day 91-94 . Samples examine ELISPOT assay measure lymphocyte immune response flow cytometry biomarker quantification T-cell response . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically least 2 year .
